entry.title: $2300 // Recently renovated big spacious railroad apt!
entry.content:
ID: 19313

Recently renovated big spacious railroad apt with two separate entrances. Not your typical boxed layout but still offers plenty of space and a great location for the price. Just a few blocks from the Graham Ave L train and all the great bars and restaurants in the area.

AMENITIES
Hardwood floors
Eat In Kitchen
High Ceilings
Small dogs ok
Cats ok
Hardwood Floors

***Please text Vaner at five-1-six-two1-eight-17-three-nine and mention specific ad you're referring to. I'm a real person who can help you find your perfect apartment. I also have plenty of other listings in the same neighborhood, just ask! Foreign applicants welcome, we take insurent and or multiple months paid up front.
